+      "patch": "@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@\n+import { callHuggingFace } from \"./Provider.js\";\n+\n+export async function rewritePost({\n+  basePost,\n+  intent,\n+  angle,\n+  facts,\n+  constraints\n+}) {\n+  const prompt = `\n+You are rewriting a developer social media post.\n+\n+Rules:\n+- Do NOT add new facts\n+- Do NOT change the meaning\n+- Keep it authentic and concise\n+- Avoid buzzwords\n+\n+Intent: ${intent}\n+Angle: ${angle}\n+\n+Known facts:\n+${JSON.stringify(facts, null, 2)}\n+\n+Base post:\n+\"\"\"\n+${basePost}\n+\"\"\"\n+\n+Platform: ${constraints.platform}\n+Max length: ${constraints.maxLength}\n+Emoji allowed: ${constraints.emoji}\n+\n+Rewrite the post:\n+`;\n+\n+   return await callHuggingFace(prompt);\n+}"
+    }
+  ]

+      "patch": "@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@\n+import { mapIntent } from './intentMapper.js';\n+import { TEMPLATES } from './templates.js';\n+\n+export function composePost(analysis) {\n+    const intent = mapIntent(analysis);\n+    const template = TEMPLATES[intent.type]?.[intent.angle];\n+    if(!template){\n+        return `Made progress today. Every change, big or small, is a step forward.\n+         Celebrating the wins and learning from the challenges. #devlife`;\n+    }\n+    return template.trim();\n+}\n\\ No newline at end of file"
+    }

+}

+      "patch": "@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@\n+export const TONES = {\n+  pro: `\n+Write in a professional, clear, industry-standard tone.\n+Concise, factual, and suitable for senior engineers.\n+`,\n+  devlife: `\n+Write like an experienced developer explaining changes to teammates.\n+Friendly, casual, but still clear and technical.\n+`,\n+  fun: `\n+Write in a light, playful developer tone.\n+Still accurate, but slightly witty.\n+`,\n+  concise: `\n+Write extremely concise.\n+No fluff. No emojis. Just the essentials.\n+`,\n+    detailed: `\n+Write in a detailed, explanatory tone.\n+Provide context and reasoning behind changes.\n+`,\n+    optimistic: `\n+Write in an optimistic, positive tone.\n+Focus on progress and learning, even from challenges.\n+`,\n+};"

+      "status": "added",
+      "additions": 39,

+      "changes": 39,
+      "blob_url": "https://github.com/garvthakre/Post90/blob/7e4e3a581590b399d99630fcb923c281ba0c8ccc/src%2Fpost%2FintentMapper.js",
+      "raw_url": "https://github.com/garvthakre/Post90/raw/7e4e3a581590b399d99630fcb923c281ba0c8ccc/src%2Fpost%2FintentMapper.js",
+      "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/garvthakre/Post90/contents/src%2Fpost%2FintentMapper.js?ref=7e4e3a581590b399d99630fcb923c281ba0c8ccc",
+      "patch": "@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@\n+export function mapIntent(analysis){\n+    const {impact,signals,totalWeight} = analysis;\n+    if(impact === 'HIGH_RISK'){\n+     return {\n+        type:'technical_decision',\n+        angle:'engineering_tradeoff',\n+     } ;  \n+\n+\n+    }\n+    if(signals.async_change || signals.promise_change){\n+        return {\n+            type:'technical_decision',\n+            angle:'asynchronous_handling',\n+        };\n+    }\n+    if(signals.error_handling_change){\n+        return {\n+            type:'technical_decision',\n+            angle:'error_handling',\n+        };\n+    }\n+    if(signals.networking_change){\n+        return {\n+            type:'technical_decision',\n+            angle:'networking',\n+        };\n+    }\n+    if(totalWeight > 500){\n+        return {\n+            type:'technical_decision',\n+            angle:'large_change',\n+        };\n+    }\n+    return {\n+        type:'daily_update',\n+        angle:'small_win',\n+    };\n+}\n\\ No newline at end of file"
+    }
+  ]
+}

+      "patch": "@@ -0,0 +1,47 @@\n+import fetch from \"node-fetch\";\n+\n+const HF_API_URL = \"https://router.huggingface.co/v1/chat/completions\";\n+\n+const MODELS = {\n+  MIXTRAL: \"mixtral-8x7b-32768\",\n+  LLAMA3_70: \"llama3-70b-8192\",\n+  LLAMA3_8: \"llama3-8b-8192\",\n+  GEMMA_7: \"gemma-7b-it\",\n+};\n+\n+const DEFAULT_MODEL = MODELS.LLAMA3_70;\n+\n+export async function callHuggingFace(prompt, model = DEFAULT_MODEL) {\n+  const res = await fetch(HF_API_URL, {\n+    method: \"POST\",\n+    headers: {\n+      Authorization: `Bearer ${process.env.HUGGINGFACE_API_KEY}`,\n+      \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n+    },\n+    body: JSON.stringify({\n+      model,\n+      messages: [\n+        {\n+          role: \"system\",\n+          content: \"You are an expert software engineer who writes excellent commit messages.\"\n+        },\n+        {\n+          role: \"user\",\n+          content: prompt\n+        }\n+      ],\n+      temperature: 0.6,\n+      max_tokens: 300,\n+    }),\n+  });\n+\n+  if (!res.ok) {\n+    const errText = await res.text();\n+    throw new Error(\n+      `HuggingFace Groq Error: ${res.status} - ${errText}`\n+    );\n+  }\n+\n+  const data = await res.json();\n+  return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim();\n+}"
+    }
+  ]
+}

+      "blob_url": "https://github.com/garvthakre/Post90/blob/b70d99dd0f75a0c10d588ea45fccc048f3b10765/src%2Fanalyze%2FcommitAnalyzer.js",
+      "raw_url": "https://github.com/garvthakre/Post90/raw/b70d99dd0f75a0c10d588ea45fccc048f3b10765/src%2Fanalyze%2FcommitAnalyzer.js",
+      "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/garvthakre/Post90/contents/src%2Fanalyze%2FcommitAnalyzer.js?ref=b70d99dd0f75a0c10d588ea45fccc048f3b10765",
+      "patch": "@@ -0,0 +1,50 @@\n+export function analyzeCommit(fileSummaries) {\n+  const signalCount = {};\n+  let totalWeight = 0;\n+\n+  for (const summary of fileSummaries) {\n+    totalWeight += summary.weight;\n+\n+    for (const signal of summary.signals) {\n+      signalCount[signal] = (signalCount[signal] || 0) + 1;\n+    }\n+  }\n+\n+  return {\n+    totalFilesChanged: fileSummaries.length,\n+    totalWeight,\n+    signals: signalCount,\n+    impact: classifyImpact(signalCount, totalWeight)\n+  };\n+}\n+\n+function classifyImpact(signals, weight) {\n+  if (\n+    signals.networking_change ||\n+    signals.env_variable_change\n+  ) {\n+    return 'HIGH_RISK';\n+  }\n+\n+  if (\n+    signals.async_change ||\n+    signals.error_handling_change ||\n+    signals.promise_change\n+  ) {\n+    return 'MEDIUM_RISK';\n+  }\n+\n+  if (\n+    signals.doc_image_change ||\n+    signals.doc_text_change ||\n+    signals.code_formatting_change ||\n+    signals.comment_change\n+  ) {\n+    return 'LOW_RISK';\n+  }\n+\n+  if (weight > 500) return 'HIGH_RISK';\n+  if (weight > 150) return 'MEDIUM_RISK';\n+\n+  return 'LOW_RISK';\n+}"
+    }
+  ]
+}
